name: Banff Rock
description: This rock climbing guidebook covers all the sport and gear-protected climbs in Banff National Park, including multi-pitch and semi-alpine routes. Learn about climbs at Tunnel Mountain, Mount Rundle, Cascade, Stewart Canyon, Sunshine area, Mount Norquay, Mounts Edith and Louis, Mount Cory, Finger-Cockscomb, Castle Mountain, Stanley Peak, Lake Louise, Takakkaw Falls in Yoho, Helen Lake, and Mount Wilson. Full of colour photos and route maps.
